import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { const timeline = [ { year: '2020', event: 'PuurKu Initiative Founded', description: 'Philanthropist Ajang establishes the initiative in response to food insecurity in refugee settlements.' }, { year: '2021', event: 'First Demonstration Gardens', description: 'Established 5 community learning farms in Nyumanzi and Ayilo settlements.' }, { year: '2022', event: 'Women Empowerment Program', description: 'Launched comprehensive training programs for 500+ women in sustainable agriculture.' }, { year: '2023', event: 'Youth Leadership Initiative', description: 'Developed agribusiness training programs for refugee youth, creating future community leaders.' }, { year: '2024', event: 'Agricultural Empowerment Center', description: 'Breaking ground on our permanent training and resource center.' } ]; const team = [ { name: 'Philanthropist Ajang', role: 'Founder & Executive Director', bio: 'Visionary leader dedicated to refugee empowerment through sustainable agriculture.' }, { name: 'Dr. Sarah Akello', role: 'Agricultural Director', bio: 'PhD in Sustainable Agriculture with 15+ years experience in East African farming systems.' }, { name: 'James Mabior', role: 'Community Coordinator', bio: 'South Sudanese refugee and community leader, bridging cultural understanding and program implementation.' }, { name: 'Mary Atyang', role: 'Women\'s Program Manager', bio: 'Champion of women\'s rights and agricultural education, leading our gender empowerment initiatives.' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Our Story of Hope and Growth

Born from a vision of dignity and self-reliance, PuurKu Initiative transforms agricultural challenges into opportunities for empowerment in refugee communities across Northern Uganda.

Nyumanzi & Ayilo Refugee Settlements, Northern Uganda
{/* Mission & Vision */}

Our Mission

To empower South Sudanese refugees through sustainable agriculture, providing the tools, knowledge, and resources needed to achieve food security and economic independence while preserving dignity and fostering community resilience.

Our Vision

A future where every refugee family can feed themselves with dignity, where communities thrive through sustainable agriculture, and where hope takes root in fertile soil to grow into lasting prosperity and self-reliance.
{/* The Story */}

The PuurKu Story

The Challenge

In the sprawling refugee settlements of Northern Uganda, thousands of South Sudanese families face a daily struggle for food security. Despite possessing generations of agricultural knowledge and an unwavering determination to farm, they lack access to quality seeds, proper tools, and modern farming techniques.

The Inspiration

"Refugees have the will to farm â€” but not the means. PuurKu exists to change that."

This powerful truth became the foundation of our work. PuurKu, meaning "to grow together" in Dinka, embodies our belief that sustainable development happens when communities unite around shared goals.

The Solution

Founded by Philanthropist Ajang, PuurKu Initiative bridges the gap between potential and possibility. We provide not just resources, but comprehensive support systems that transform agricultural challenges into opportunities for empowerment, education, and economic growth.

65,000+ Refugees in Settlements
85% Depend on Agriculture
2,500+ Families We've Reached
{/* Timeline */}

Our Journey

{timeline.map((item, index) => (
{item.year}

{item.event}

{item.description}

 ))}
{/* Team */}

Meet Our Team

Dedicated professionals working together to transform lives through sustainable agriculture

{team.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.bio}

 ))}
{/* Values */}

Our Core Values

Sustainability

We believe in farming practices that protect the environment while ensuring long-term food security for future generations.

Community

Strength comes from unity. We foster collaborative approaches that bring communities together around shared agricultural goals.

Empowerment

We provide tools and knowledge that enable individuals and communities to become self-reliant and economically independent.

Innovation

We embrace modern agricultural techniques and technologies while respecting traditional knowledge and cultural practices.

Dignity

Every person deserves to feed their family with pride. We ensure our programs preserve and enhance human dignity.

Impact

We measure success through tangible improvements in food security, income generation, and community resilience.

{/* Call to Action */}

Join Our Mission

Together, we can transform lives and build sustainable futures. Every contribution, partnership, and act of support helps refugee families grow toward self-sufficiency and dignity.

Partner With Us See Our Impact
); }; export default About;
